content.detailedDescription: Went outside to have a smoke and walked to the north side of my house and as i looked to the west i saw what looked to be a orange light in the sky i watched it as it came closer iwas tring to see a blinking light to debunk my self but there wasnt one so i ran and got my girlfriend  to come witness this special occasion and we watched it for probally 2 mins or so she was busy iguess but i ran and got a camera and i was trying to get it on the screen but i couldn't then i looked back up but it was gone i know it wasnt a satellite i went over that with her too it was really much closer
content.summary: Was flying outa the west moving east southeast looked like a low plane but really bright no blinking light no sound allmost moved like satellite but much closer

content.detailedDescription:
I was with my girlfriend in the hills outside of carson, we had seen a shooting star above that died out, we had thought it was a shooting star or something of that nature, but after we had seen it it seemeed that the satr around the event were all blinking???

well, as we left going down the hill we seen a huge thing of ligtht. we had thought it was a plane at first beacause there is an airport in carson this thing was not moving though. and when we were in the city we seen the light spilt into two lights and back into one. my girlfriend seen a lighte strike the ground of the hill. well this hill is called prision hill, over next the prision in carson city.

i wanted to see what it was for fun and all that as we got to the hill the light went away as we left a plane what i beilve to be an f-16 circuled the city very quick like and also went off somewhere?

as we left we seen the light appear and go. after that i said whatever and went home. i don't belive in things like this but i can not explain what i seen.

i have a little video on my phone, it kinda sucks but you can see that that thing is there and not moving???????
content.summary: A light above carson city, that spilt from one light to two lights, it would lose light and get stronger. it had even flashed a thing of light on the hill where i had seen it.

content.detailedDescription:
Back in 1983-1984 (i think i was about 13-14 years old) i was at my local aussie rules football (frankston ycw) club in frankston at a "sausage sizzle" with my team mates. a "sausage sizzle" is an event for the team to get together with parents and cook sausages etc and have some fun at the club house.

i guess at about 8pm, after we ate, the parents moved inside the club house to talk and have fun etc while us kids basically ran around the football grounds getting up to mischief like nick-knocking and playing tag in the dark etc. we had a great sporting area called jubilee park with two huge ovals (and a smaller one) surrounded by creeks and scrub/bush and a railway line which is surrounded by housing. there were also netball courts and a swimming centre. we often used to get the railway crossing lights working using a coat-hanger and would have traffic stopped for ages. at the time a huge laugh!!

this particular night was just like every other sausage sizzle. young kids running around like crazy. at some point during the evening myself and another team mate (don't want to name him) ended up taking a break by lying on our backs on the north side of the smaller oval on a very small embankment star gazing to the north. we were talking and laughing etc and just watching the stars. i was looking at different stars and for no reason in-particular focused on what i thought was a nice bright star imaging how far away it was and which part of the universe it belonged to. i estimate i was staring at this 'star' for about 30 secs when it dropped from the sky as if someone had cut a string holding it in place. it fell for about 1 second (not fast) and then moved in a reverse 'j' motion and shot away into space at an incredible speed. it definitely accelerated and didn't just vanish.  being young i freaked out and said to my friend "did you see that?" he said "what?" at that i got up and bolted inside the club house and sat with the parents for the rest of the night which you can imagine was pretty rare as everyone else was outside playing.

the exact co-ordinates on google earth where we were, are: 38 degrees 09'04.36 s   - 145 degrees 09'34.72 e

i've never documented this story but have told a few people, all who either don't believe it or seem intrigued. after reading back over the above it doesn't seem to be very believable but i know what i saw. it was real. the funny thing is i probably wouldn't be typing this but i just read someone else saying almost the exact same thing with regard to their experience...In the usa i think. i must say that did give me goose bumps when i read his/her account.
content.summary: Watching motionless star-like light then just dropped like someone cut a string and shot into space

content.detailedDescription: Several weeks ago i woke up to a fog-like mist in my bedroom,i sat up and in the mist a pair of "eyes",more like someting electronic stared at me ..I panicked and turned on my lamp and it was gone.This was not a dream or a hallucination..However i just started to forget about it when i woke up last nite to a glowing light in my room,all the lights were turned off.I layed there paralyzed..Then i finally swung my legs around and began to get up..The light shut off just like a switch.I eventually went back to bed,but when i woke up i felt a pain in my belly button..I looked down and my belly button was bleeding and extremely red and inflamed.What is happening? i am terrified to go to sleep.Also the electricity in my room in the area where this happens is constantly going in and out.Sometimes it works and other times it doesnt.Please help,don't know what to do.
content.summary: Woke up to glowing light in bedroom with all lights off/bleeding upon waking up

content.detailedDescription: It was a summer night, almost 9 and im was alone with my fathe���s telescope,in front of my old house (apartment)  im was looking to east when im see this oval shape light flighing north to south im inmitialy now thas not an airplane because of its shape im didnt feel any emotion at that moment im was looking it like for 40 seconds its velocity was like 200 knots aproximily and it has intermediations in its lights white and light blue and im lost visual contac when the object cross a montain on the south. after that im going to the living roon with my parents im told my story to them but they didnt believe  me.
content.summary: A ovalshape (light) with diferent intentions of light ,white and light blue moving from north to south at almost 2000 feet of altutude

content.detailedDescription: I just put my daughter to bed around 23.40 and went to bathroom to take a shower i opened the bathroom window when something caught my eye on my right i looked up and saw around 8-10 orange object in a staggered line moving across the sky i noticed one of the objects at the back 2nd from last move sideways remained there for around 4-5 seconds then move back where it was originally. i called for my daughter to come and see and got my mobile phone to video the objects we both stared at it until they passed my house to the other side as i moved to the front of my house they all disappeared except for one which eventually it disappeared too. they made absolutely no sound and could only imagine if it was man made then some kind of sound would had been heard.
content.summary: 8-10 orange objects in staggered line with no sound

content.detailedDescription: Ufo moved across the sky west to east like a plane would then stoped made two moves a plane could never made sharp fast moves all most like a z then light changed to a pinkish pin point and headed south east out of sight as i watched this thing travel across the sky i could not comprehend what i was seeing
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Small ball of fire moving slow accross sky west to east with a red glow moving back and forth across top of  fire ball

content.detailedDescription: A massive triangle flew slowly over beaverton,or around 11:30 at night. it made no sounds or emissions. the structure looked as big as two football fields. each tip of the triangle had a glowing light and in the middle it had a sort of symmetrical light pattern. all the lights seemed to be a reddish color. i watched this for about 10-15 seconds until the triangle was blocked by the tree line. it was floating/flying pretty slow and it was disturbing how big and slow it was moving! it was less than a mile up in the sky.
content.summary: A massive triangle flew slowly over beaverton, or around 11:30 at night. it made no sounds or emmisions. the structure looked as big as two football fields.

content.detailedDescription: We were at kiest park and walking to our truck after my daughter's soccer game when my husband and daughter started kicking the ball around.  my husband kicked it up in the air and my daughter has really sharp eyes so she spotted something in the sky next to a couple of clouds.  she asked my husband "papa what's that?" and he didn't see anything until he went and stood right next to her so she could point up.  i looked up and didn't see anything for a few seconds but then i saw something move to the right then back to the left then right and left a again! it wasn't a plane or balloon but i wasn't up there; but ask yourself....If it was a balloon or plane, could it do that, that high up and the wind not do anything to it? it was totally wickedly scary!  i stared at it and then several others at the park were staring up and looking at it, too.  needless to say we got the heck out of there.   i do not think we are totally alone....
content.summary: Milky colored or silver

content.detailedDescription: at about 1 am on june 19th 2009 i saw several  glowing circular objects came down from a higher altitude and seemed to level off never breaking their, lob sided(one side of the v was a disc short of making it symmetrical), v formation. the level they dropped off to seemed to be maybe one to two miles up off the ground and i watched them till they were no longer visible to my eye. their speed seemed to be flying faster than a normal aircraft would fly at that altitude. i see airplanes fly in and out of the beaverton and pdx airports every day. at first they looked like orbs but as they swooped down then leveling off they looked more flat disc like and glowing extremely bright. this all lasted about 6-7 seconds?.
content.summary: I saw a lob sided v formation of glowing discs fly across the night sky. they looked as big or gigger than commercial jets.

content.detailedDescription:
Possible "ufo base" in eastern oregon.  on a military watchdog website i read that boeing operates a generally secret drone or cruise missile test facility in morrow county in eastern oregon. the facility is located on the "officially" decommissioned boardman bombing range located just south of the columbia river, about 140 miles east of portland, oregon.  also, some years earlier i had seen an unknown object fly directly in front of me at very close range, then making abrupt changes in height, when i was driving perhaps 50 miles south of the range.

i believe whatever is going on at this test facility may have some relationship to ufo sightings in the region. remember, boeing is largest aerospace contractor to the us department of defense. it makes cruise missiles, surveillance drones, and it is anyone���s' guess whatever undeclared things that fly.

note the number of sightings in the portland, oregon area that are low altitude flying objects which exit the metro area *flying toward the east* toward the western mouth of the columbia river gorge, in the direction of the boardman range.   

the facility and its runway are easily found on google earth.  look for a large rectangular land area of brown "scorched earth" to the south of the columbia river, west of pendleton, oregon.  the coordinates are lat. 45.747927  longitude -119.801855.  the buildings and storage areas seem to be sort of camouflaged, as if this were a crop duster strip.  not exactly, a storage area at the eastern end of the 1 mile runway is on a track and apparently can be moved.  and the radar tracking dishes on the west end of the runway near the cluster of buildings.

i am with jacques valle in guessing that most ufos are a form of psychic-physical phenomena, earth-based, of the types seen for thousands of years, whose appearance indicates far advanced technology.  therefore i think it possible that some recent, clearly ufo sightings in oregon and washington are actually some advanced boeing flying craft, such as drones, weaponless cruise missile, or other test craft that are flown out this remote facility. if so, it���s anyone���s' guess how boeing acquired such advanced technology.

most of the range is quite remote and well off main roads - it was regularly for bombing practice during world war ii, and although "officially" decommissioned for a number of years, local ranchers say that is not the case.  fighter aircraft from naval air station whidbey island, located in northwest washington state, are said to do training runs over the range; presumably air national guard bases in portland and pendleton, oregon, and boise, idaho use it too. fwiw, a few years ago two advanced fighter aircraft collided over the columbia river, not far from the range.

i think it possible that boeing is currently testing some sort of advanced propulsion drone. it appears as a yellow-white oblong light, or amber colored or white globe, the size of a van. these have been seen at night running at low altitude over portland this spring and summer, 2009. it is a bright light, with no running lights, no sound, and no wings or fuselage can be seen. several witnesses report them leaving the areas going east.

something interesting in my own experience, which has a relationship to ufo sightings.  it was in the mid 1980s, in the morning, just east of kimberly, oregon.  kimberly is basically a gas station and it is located almost directly south of the boardman range.  my wife and i were driving east.  what looked to be a torpedo, or very small jet crossed over the road, perhaps 150 feet ahead of us, 100 feet off the road.  trees shaded the road ahead of the object and the sun was not in our eyes.

the craft just popped into view in front of us and i slammed on the brakes.  it flew rather slowly at maybe 50 miles per hours per hour.  at first i thought it was a rocket or missile, and then someone's radio-controlled experiments, but it was flying right above the ground surface under very tight control.  it was apparently made of a shiny metal; it had a short tail structure and very short, right-angle, stubby wing-like appendages. it had an opening in the back, which looked like a jet exhaust, but saw no cowling for a jet engine. it seemed too small for a pilot, in fact here was no see no cockpit or window. i also considered that it was some kind of new "shoot-em-down" practice drone used over the pacific. it never occurred to me to consider it a ufo, but it was certainly of unknown origin to me.

based on the design of a video of a cruise missile i saw during the first iraq war, this thing could have been an experimental design.  but it was more like a rocket tube or guided bomb than the cruise missiles or surveillance drones i have seen - those have actual wings and taller tail structures and obvious engines. still, i would put my money on it being a flying military weapon of some sort because i recently found out about the boeing test facility at the boardman range. nevertheless....

that road we were on goes through an area of mountains and steep ravines.  this craft had descended down off a steep slope at about 45 degrees immediately to the north of the road. it crossed the other side of the road at maybe 15 feet and kept diving at that angle right straight at a river that ran perhaps 150 feet below the road level and 500 feet off to the south.

at about 50 feet above the river the thing sharply veered upward, leveled out for a moment, and appeared to be heading directly into a steep slope immediately on the south bank of the river, looking like a flying bomb. we expected that this craft would crash head on, and just watched.  but when almost to the slope the thing snapped into a steep climb, exhaust started shooting out the apparent exhaust hole on the back.  it was about 1/4 mile away at this point, our window was down, but we heard no noise from it, we could hear the river.  it accelerated over the ridgeline, clearing it by 10 to 20 feet, but at the top made an immediate steep bank downward and disappeared on the other side. the change in direction was abrupt, like a playground seesaw - we saw first the smooth top side of the body and in a second the smooth bottom side.  we kept waiting for smoke to rise from the other side due its crashing.  there was none, the thing did not reappear.

google will clearly show a system of deep valleys that snake through hills and mountains between the boardman range and the region around kimberly.  i bet boeing or the military makes these things, sends them out from boardman, and flies them down low, far into in the ravines making them totally "under the radar���.

food for thought and maybe someone in the dalles, hermiston, and pendleton oregon, or bingen and goldendale, washington can keep an eye out.  who knows, maybe fighter pilots are running training missions around boardman, chasing some hot new design, practicing up for a chance to chase some ufo *not* made by a military contractor.
content.summary: Possible "ufo base" in oregon .  secret boeing test site in e. oregon

content.detailedDescription: Just want to say first that nearly every night now since early april, i have been seeing strange objects in the sky.  upon many occassions there have been several witnesses with me, who saw the same thing that i did, so i know i'm not losing my mind. the first object i want to tell you about, appeared early this morning right around 4:40 am.  this is also the approx. time that most all of the sightings have occurred.  i stepped out for a cigarette, immediately looked up in the sky to the left, about 45 degrees...This rectangle orange glowing lantern shaped object darted out from behind the tree tops, floating almost, but moving at a fast pace, made a zig-zag pattern until it disappeared behind the neighbors tree line.  i couldn't try to find out where it went, i had to stay on work grounds.  about an hour later, i stepped out for my last look at the brightening morning sky, as i stepped out of the door, i looked up to the right in the north eastern sky, i saw the moon, the morning star...And then there was this very bright light...As bright as the morning star,  moving at a slow pace toward the planet...It came to a stop in a wierd motion...And then grew very dim...Then it slowly rose higher up in the sky and just stopped.  i watched it for a good ten minutes, then i had to go back inside, though i wanted to watch it as the sun rose.  a week and a half ago, eerily, i saw this same object appear in the exact same spot in the sky right around the same time.  about 3 weeks ago, me and a fellow co-worker were sitting outside talking, this time it was around 2:30 a.M., flying saucers were the farthest thing from our minds at the time, when all of a sudden...Right above the tree tops was this squarish, disk shaped flying object, creeping up to us overhead, about 150 feet up in the air a pretty  low altitude...It was close enough we could see some strange markings on the craft...Almost like symbols with 4 blue lights at each corner and a green light in the center.  this object had no propellers whatsoever, no flashing lights, but wierder than that was that it made no sound.  no here's another wierd thing... back in april, on a cool cloudy night...My boyfriend was taking me to work.  it had been a very stressful day and actually i was dreading going to work that night as i was exhausted.  we were already a couple of blocks away from our house when i noticed this same kind of object hovering right beside the t.V. tower.  at first we thought it was a helicopter, but when we drove further on and it came in clearer sight, we saw that it wasn't a helicopter or an airplane.  it was this rectangle object, with blue and green lights...Just hovering in one spot right by the tower, which is a no fly zone by the way.  when we came to a stop at the stop sign...We listened for some kind of aircraft noise, there was none, just the sound of cars going by.  as we drove away from the tower and the craft... the lights on the craft turned into one solid red light and moved slowely off to the south till it was out of sight.  i wish i had had a camera or a camcorder to take pictures of these things, but unfortunately i don't own one, can't afford it right now.  maybe thats why they're showing themselves to me.  i feel like they're observing us closely. seems like southern illinois is turning into a hot spot for anomolies.   i've never seen anything like these objects before in my life...And to tell you the truth, i'm starting to get a little worried.  thanks for allowing me to share.
content.summary: Orange glowing lantern shaped object  passes silently overhead in a zig-zag patttern.

i've never seen anything like these objects before in my life...And to tell you the truth, i'm starting to get a little worried.  thanks for allowing me to share.

content.detailedDescription: While returning home from dinner, a friend and i just exited the car and were heading to the apartments when i saw a very bright white object traveling north to south.  we were in the location of the outskirts of lakewood (5 min east of bear creek park), when we saw the object. it was a very bright white light; looked about the brightness of an aircraft in landing configuration.  it was just over the rooftops of the apartment buildings or 30 degrees above the horizon.  looked to be at a low altitude of 3000���, traveling north to south over lakewood, co.  we both witnessed the object traveling at a good clip; maybe about 150 knots. when my friend asked what the object was it stopped for less than a second then kept traveling.  it performed a few quick squiggles as it traveled, but did not change brightness. it was witnessed for a minute the disappeared.  it also seemed to respond to my mental greetings by the squiggles. i have seen many ufo���s in this area since moving here a year ago, and are all about the similar type usually (every two weeks or so).  there is a lot of air traffic into the departure/arrival  flight path of dia also in this area, but  they have not been traveling in the same air routes.  a few times they have paced aircraft but not very often.
content.summary: Bright white object; lakewood, co

content.detailedDescription: I and two friends sat in the backyard and watched a hazy pinkish (lights?) chevron-shaped craft move at medium speed across the sky from northwest to southeast. it was trailed by two small white pinpoints that looked like stars but were moving at the same speed and direction as the first craft. they appeared to be higher up than the chevron shape. the event lasted about thirty seconds.
content.summary: Pink chevron trailed by two smaller white lights

content.detailedDescription: The two triangles attached by two lights were seen from the back yard they flew over the house we ran to the front and watched them speed off.There was no sound,it was amazing to see
content.summary: 2 triangles attached by 2 lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was out on my blacony smoking at 9:28am on july 19, 2009, when my two year old daughter, from behind the screen door, said "look at the plane daddy" as she normally does,when she sees an airplane.  when i looked up i dropped my cigarette and ran into the house to put on my glasses.  when i came back out, in about 8 seconds, i noticed another one.  there were now two white-ish objects in the sky appearing to elevate at a seady pace as they moved their ways through the morning sky (neither one changed directions, just a steady course, until they could no longer be seen).  they were traveling in two different directions.  one headed south, the other headed east. i assume they went into space because they kept getting smaller and smaller.  i cannot guage the speed but within a minute or two they had gotten so small i couldn't see them.  

i couldn't see wings on these objects.  

i live between jfk and laguardia airports and i have never seen airplanes at that altitude around here (or ever, usually airplaned at their maximum elevation still can be identified on a clear day, easily).  if an airplane is landing or taking off from either one of the airports they are very noticible in the sky and pretty low.

it should also be mentioned that there are no clouds in the sky, so i could see contrast.

it is a surreal feeling seeing something that you cannot identify.
content.summary: Two objects seen over queens, ny that elevated into space

content.detailedDescription: I was setting on my front porch talking on the phone to a friend from ohio when i noticed a star like orb moving real slow and low  this time to the ground at first i thought it was a plain then noticing no blinker lights on it i ran in the house to grab my binoculars and what i seen was a glowing pulsating light. the orb then made a turn onto a different direction in midair and as it was going it became dim to my eye's and dissipated. my mom also is a witness to seeing it also.
content.summary: Seen star light object or as know orb flying real low over mountain

content.detailedDescription:
We have multiple photos of multiple ufo's taken in various directions of the sacramento night sky.  two of the people are known in the ufo community thru work at the ufo congress, one is a reporter specializing in ufo's.

we all saw the same things throughout the sky.  there is video and photos and first hand accounts avail from four people.  from what the two in the ufo community said, the sky was very active and the experience was amazing.  

two of us have witnessed, recorded and noted these events since our initial report may 9, 2009. 

multiple objects of variable shapes, brightnesses and appearance.

the image attached was taken some time in the last few months but, we did see this one on friday night along with many others.
content.shape: Diamond,  Fireball,  Flash,  Oval,  Sphere,  Star-like,  Other
content.summary: There were four of us with photography equipment a lot of activity over several hours

content.detailedDescription: My 2 sissters went 2 the store on the way back we all herd them screaming me and my 2 bothers and mother went out side to see what was going on they were screaming and pointing back at us we all looked up over the house not more than 40 feet in the air was a flying object stationary at the time my sissters keep screaming it started to move slowly away i then ran throw the house to the back door look an saw it disaper with only one red slowly polsating lihgt  the thing is tha all together my famaly has seen5 ufo sighting in my life  we have missing time experece and i have had phsical evedence
content.summary: It was over the house all family seen it.

content.detailedDescription:
During a walk around virginia lake, in reno, the two of us sat on a park bench and looked se over the north tower of the peppermill casino and saw a group of white lights (star point) varying between 3 and ~14 (mostly ~10) "dancing" in the eastern sky just under saturn for at least 30 minutes (estimate 40-50 minutes).  the lights each lasted for several seconds to several minutes and moved in smooth arcing patterns erratically back and forth within a a fist sized (at arms length) area of the sky.  toward the end a flashing light on a straight trajectory (probable airplane) approached the area and flew through it.  during the approach the lights diminished to just one, then as the plane disappeared 2 more lights appeared, the 3 "danced", as had the previous larger group, and over ~ 5 minutes and then disappeared one by one.  no further activity was noted for several minutes and we walked the 3 blocks home and entered this report. 

during this episode a couple (man and woman) walked by and were questioned whether they saw the lights as well.  they acknowledged seeing them.
content.summary: 3-14 points of dancing white lights visible for ~45 minutes

content.detailedDescription: Me and my wife stepped outside to smoke. she pointed behind me and said look there was a very bright orange light toward some tree's near our house. it slowly moved remaining very bright toward the north roughly for 15 seconds then faded out. i kept looking due east and it reappeared just above tree level and begin descending down and was so bright it even lit up the trees and did this for another 15 seconds and then i lost sight of it as it faded out again. ive seen other unexplained lights here several times a night it does not have the appearance of any planes,helicopter etc.
content.summary: Bright object appeared for 15  seconds

content.detailedDescription:
While driving through kingsley, michigan at approx. 11pm in mid. august 2008 my wife and i noticed an object that resembled a plane but was too low, too bright, and did not make a noise, it flew across the sky about a half mile up and north of us, it was heading west at the time. maybe 20 min. later, we entered traverse city. at the intersection of birmley road and key stone road where we looked up and seen a, what looked like a metal framed, triangular object with a main window in the front center, and red, white, and blue lights, one of each color, with two bright beaming spot lights in the center near the front. this time the object was only about 50 yards in the air hovering straight above our vehicle in the same spot or moving very slowly, it made little to no noise, possibly a light humming noise. i slowed my car down and it sped up a little. the object changed direction from east to north hovering across the trailer park on birmley road. we turned around and tried to follow the u.F.O. but it was gone beyond the treeline. we see what looks like the same one occasionally but never as close as the encounter on birmley road. the object looked like it was 20ft. wide x 30ft. long and possibly 4 to 5ft. in height. (it looked thin) it did not seem threatening but rather mysterious and amusing, it looked to be traveling approx. 5-10mph.     
                   truth, a.V.N.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: On multiple occasions, almost every night , floating across sky, tree level in horizon. hovers, sometimes totally silent ocasionally turns on sound.

content.detailedDescription:
We mufon investigators not only investigate, but sometimes we are fortunate enough to actually witness the proof ourselves... that the truth is out there... in 3d... and as real as the day is long!

i saw it flash... i turned my scope on it in the early morning hours of my sky watch...And i captured the reality of it!

seeing is believing!
content.summary: A real anomalous ufo...Solid as a rock @ over 10k ft. +

content.detailedDescription:
We were at a friends house and noticed what first appeared to be a plane engulfed in flames in the sky just to the north of their house.  however we quickly realized that the object was not moving and their was no smoke or discernible trajectory.  it appeared like the flames were rolling or cascading from the object. as it moved further away it no longer appeared to be in flames, but had a reddish tint.  then suddenly it started rising very quickly and was gone. no man made object can move that fast. eight of us witnessed this and were all in disbelief.  personally, i had chills. 

much to our amazement, about 20-30 minutes later we saw a second object. at first i thought this was a firework. it appeared as a ball of flames rising in the sky but just as the other one did, it stopped and hovered.  it also moved east following the same path as the first.  eventually this one also started rising very quickly and then disapeared. 

unfortunately we weren't able to capture and video or pics. we were going to report it to the police just to go on record that we had witnessed this but eventually decided against it.  after doing some research i came across this site so i'm reporting it here in hopes that maybe someone else witnessed this.
content.summary: Circular light

content.detailedDescription: I was standing out on the back balcony smoking a cigarette, when a fireball like object appeared from the north. the object slowly moved west, the object then darted southeast and disappeared. about two minutes later another fireball like object appeared from the north, headed west a white beam appeared from the top and curved southwest and disappeared.
content.summary: 2 objects

content.detailedDescription:
Sighted from north lake apartments around 11:20pm lasting for several minutes. the object emerged from a wooded area across from the apartment complex and ascended in altitude, depending on the actual size of the object it could have been very close. it traveled from the northeast to ese of our position. the object was luminescent color very similar to the amber color of common streetlights. the object ascended, changed course once it was east of us and travelled away from the planet until it was no longer visible (or obscured by light cloud cover). the first pass lasted approxiamately 2 minutes and the second pass occurred a minute or two after the first. we walked around to get a better vantage point at the northeast side of the complex but there was no third pass. at this very moment i am watching for another occurrence.


this is the first report i have made but it is not the first time i have witnessed this same type of object.



no evidence this time. sorry.


~justin
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Unknown
content.summary: 2 objects, or one object passing by twice in elkhart indiana area.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately nine p.M. pacific time in the state of colima, at playa pascuales (beach/surf resort) i was standing out at the edge of the cabana enjoying a cool evening thunderstorm. the storm's edge was exactly at the interface of ocean and land as i could see the stars out over the ocean and over land was pure dark and raining. all of a sudden a meteor-like object descended from approximately eighty degrees (if strait up is ninety) down to sea level some many miles offshore. it seemed to blink twice on the way down and did not display a light emission typical of a meteor, rather it maintained an unchanging brightness of approximately -1 magnitude in astronomical terms. the relative speed was that of a meteor however. what grabbed my attention was when it abruptly stopped just above sea level and took a hard right to the north.  then it disappeared into an offshore thunderstorm. all of my surf buddies were totally wasted and so did    not turn their heads fast enough to see it. the event lasted about two and a half seconds. on my way home driving through baja california i related the sighting to a local at another prominent surf spot. he was not impressed as his closest encounter was within one hundred feet. apparently he witnessed a saucer rise up from out of the ravine next to his casita (little house) and shoot off out over the pacific.
content.summary: Appeared as meteor-like object without the telltale afterglow

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i were sitting around in our backyard on the evening of july 4th watching fireworks when i saw a red/orange sphere shaped object coming from the south. i knew it wasn't an airplane because of the way it moved in the sky...I didn't mention it. two seconds later my wife noticed the second one and pointed it out to the rest of us;she joked that it was a ufo. we tried to right it off as a firework at first but when it turned right and went straight up into the sky until we couldn't see it anymore, we started to think it might have been something else. a second later a third object came and did exatly what the first and second one did and thats when i asked my aunt and cousin to take a picture. we were in awe. the fourth one came and mimiced the first,second and third. 
these are the pictures that were taken from a cell phone and camera...
content.summary: Saw four sphere shaped objects,shing red and orange come from the south towards me and stopped briefly before slightly turning to the right and going straight up, one by one.

content.detailedDescription: A storm had just passed through the area an i was standing outside watching the lightning to the south. i then noticed a round object hovering below a cloud top to the thunderstorm. what caught my attention was the black dot standing out against the cloud and lightning. i was able to watch the object for over 4 minutes.I first thought the object was a balloon but with the wind in the area from the storm it was stopped. object gave the appearance it was spinning.It was black and a second color that was nearly the color of a flame or copper color. as i watched it it began to lift into the clouds and the flame color disappeared.  this happened about 30 seconds before a jetliner headed to hobby airport flew just below the area the object was in. i then noticed it just to the side of a cloud and it lifted extremely fast into the clouds as a second jet flew into the area. i did not see the object after that. the two jets were southwest airline 737s.
content.summary: Object hovering below severe storm cloud top then lifted into cloud as jet approached
